HOME.my-webpage: I'm an Angular Developer. This platform serves as a technical playground showcasing modern web engineering patterns.
HOME.philosophy: I specialize in building scalable Enterprise applications with a focus on clean architecture and high performance.
HOME.tools: The tech stack behind this project:
HOME.including: including Signals, Standalone, SSR and Zone-less

FORM.component-desc-desktop: An advanced dynamic form featuring complex cross-field validation, conditional logic, and reactive state synchronization. Observe the live data model on the right to see how the system processes data in real-time.
FORM.component-desc-mobile: An advanced dynamic form featuring complex cross-field validation, conditional logic, and reactive state synchronization. Observe the live data model below to see how the system processes data in real-time.
FORM.name: Name
FORM.age-hint: If the cat is not yet a year old, enter 0.
FORM.invalid-age: Date of birth does not match the entered age
FORM.beauty-error: The beauty of the cat must not be less than 5

LIST.component-desc: A list implementation that combines two solutions: "infinity", i.e. constantly adding more elements to the list data source, and "virtuality", i.e. dynamically adding and removing list elements from the document structure. This allows even the largest lists to load quickly and remain responsive.
LIST.hello: Welcome to the infinite hotel. Please select a room:

GRID.component-desc: A comprehensive Enterprise-grade data grid implementation powered by AG Grid. Features state management (filtering, sorting, column layouts), large dataset handling, automatic storage of grid state, and CSV report export.
GRID.name: Name

MODEL_3D.component-desc: Interactive 3D model viewer built with Three.js library. Features include loading different GLB models, automatic model rotation, adjustable lighting intensity, controlling the camera (orbit controls), and support for model animations.
